means: （被砍下的树的）树桩( stump的名词复数 )
僵直地行走，跺步行走( stump的第三人称单数 )
（选举前）在某一地区作政治性巡回演说

sentence.Network_en: Rocks and stumps supplied the place of chairs at the picnic.
sentence.Network_cn: 野餐时石头和树桩都充当了椅子.

sentence.Network_en: If you don't stir your stumps, Tom, you'll be late for school again.
sentence.Network_cn: 汤姆, 如果你不快走,上学又要迟到了.

sentence.Network_en: The fungus can persist in stumps and roots for many years.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种真菌宿存于树木的伐桩和根系中许多年.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Study on Suitable Stumps Height伐根适宜高度的研究
球道的两头各立有三根直立木柱，称为「门柱」（stumps）。两根「横木」（bail）放置于柱门顶部的凹槽之中，将三根柱门连接起来。三根柱门和两根横木共同组成一.
When forested land must be used , all stumps should be removed., 如不得不用林地时 , 所有伐桩都要消除.
The explorers sat on stumps to have a rest ., 探险者坐在树墩上休息.

list.abs: American election expressions — 英语广场 ... home stretch: 终点直道；决战 stump speech: 政治演说 rank and file: 普通的.
stump jump disc plough 跃障式圆盘犁stump puller 除根机stump work 斯顿艺术刺绣
stump elevator 牙残根梃子stump file 牙残根锉stump splinter forceps 牙残根碎片钳
stuff 材料，原料stump bur 牙残根钻stump elevator 牙残根梃子

entry.def: A stump is a small part of something that remains when the rest of it has been removed or broken off.

example.ex: If you have a tree stump, check it for fungus...
example.tran: 要是有树桩的话，检查一下上面有没有长菌类。

example.ex: The tramp produced a stump of candle from his deep pockets.
example.tran: 流浪汉从深口袋里掏出了一截蜡烛。

entry.def: In cricket, the stumps are the three wooden sticks that are placed upright in the ground to form the wicket.

entry.tran: 把…难住;难倒;使…一筹莫展
entry.def: If you are stumped by a question or problem, you cannot think of any solution or answer to it.

example.ex: John is stumped by an unexpected question...
example.tran: 一个意想不到的问题把约翰难住了。

example.ex: Well, maybe I stumped you on that one.
example.tran: 好吧，也许我在那件事上使你为难了。

entry.tran: 迈着沉重的步子走;跺着脚走
entry.def: If you stump somewhere, you walk there with heavy steps.

example.ex: The Marshal stepped over the vacuum-cleaner and stumped out of the room.
example.tran: 元帅迈过真空吸尘器，脚步沉重地走出了房间。

entry.def: If politicians stump the country or stump for a candidate, they travel around making campaign speeches before an election.

example.ex: When candidates went stumping around the country, people traveled for miles on foot, by horse, by carriage to hear them speak...
example.tran: 当竞选人在全国作巡回演说时，人们会步行、骑马或坐车数英里赶去听他们的演讲。

example.ex: He was in Georgia stumping for Senator Wyche Fowler, a Democrat.
example.tran: 他正在佐治亚州为民主党参议员威奇·福勒作巡回演说。

entry.def: If politicians are on the stump, they are campaigning for an election.

example.ex: The presidential candidates are on the stump today.
example.tran: 总统候选人今天在作巡回演说。

example.en: You need good strong stumps to that kind of climbing.
example.zh: 要那么攀爬，你非得有两条非常健壮的腿才行。

auth_sentence.content: The charred stumps of felled trees still stand around them.
auth_sentence.res_content: The charred stumps of felled trees still stand around them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The charred stumps of felled trees still stand around them.

auth_sentence.content: That was what the bloody stumps were about.
auth_sentence.res_content: That was what the bloody stumps were about.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That was what the bloody stumps were about.

auth_sentence.content: My fingers are bloody stumps bouncing on on the keyboard.
auth_sentence.res_content: My fingers are bloody stumps bouncing on on the keyboard.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My fingers are bloody stumps bouncing on on the keyboard.
